NK010(tha)041:0: khros ma nag mo'i gtor 'bul ni /
NK010(tha)041:1: gtor ma sha lnga bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du bsam la /
NK010(tha)041:2: a ra li phem zhes pas bla ma mkha' 'gro spyan drangs /
NK010(tha)041:4: ha ri ni sa ra tsa hri ya i dam
NK010(tha)041:5: ba ling+ta g+h+rih+na g+h+rih+na kha kha kh+aa hi kh+aa hi
NK010(tha)041:7: h'u skye med rnam dag chos dbyings pho brang nasah
NK010(tha)041:8: 'gro ba'i don mdzad rdo rje phag mo ni sku
NK010(tha)041:9: mdog mthing nag gti mug phag gi dbu gcer bu
NK010(tha)041:10: rngams brjid 'jigs pa'i cha lugs can phyag g.yas gri
NK010(tha)041:11: gug 'bar bas nyon mongs gcod g.yon pas thod pa
NK010(tha)041:12: khrag bkang zhal du gsol pha rol phyin drug rus
NK010(tha)041:13: pa'i rgyan drug ldan bde chen yab dang gnyis med
NK010(tha)041:14: kha t+aam 'dzin zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum ro yi gdan
NK010(tha)041:15: la 'gyings bskal pa'i me dpung klong na h'u sgra
NK010(tha)041:16: sgrogs gnas gsum mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams dbang du sdud
NK010(tha)041:17: mchog thun dngos grub ma lus kun ster ma mthu
NK010(tha)041:18: stobs bdag mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod zhi rgyas
NK010(tha)041:19: dbang drag phrin las sgrub pa'i lha rigs bzhi mkha'
NK010(tha)041:20: 'gro'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod dam rdzas bdud rtsi
NK010(tha)041:21: 'bar ba 'di bzhes la lha 'dre mi gsum ma
NK010(tha)041:22: lus dbang du bsdus gnod byed 'byung po'i tshogs rnams
NK010(tha)041:23: rdul du rlogs rnal 'byor bcol ba'i phrin las 'grub
